name: Third Eye Awareness
description: Enhancing the ability to sense unseen truths and perceive reality beyond the physical world.

cards.title: Activating the Intuitive Center
cards.description: Techniques for awakening and training the third eye for enhanced intuition.
cards.bulletpoints: Pineal Gland Stimulation, Light and Sound Meditation, Sensory Expansion Drills

cards.title: Tuning Into Subtle Energy Fields
cards.description: Developing sensitivity to energetic shifts, auras, and vibrational changes.
cards.bulletpoints: Aura Reading Exercises, Energetic Resonance Training, Frequency Awareness

cards.title: Using Intuition for Decision Making
cards.description: Learning how to interpret intuitive signals and integrate them into daily choices.
cards.bulletpoints: Yes/No Intuition Testing, Gut Instinct Calibration, Real-Time Intuitive Judgment
